src_original: deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṃ mahānaye // 192
mantraprayogam atulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam /  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ sākyasiṃhādibhir varaiḥ // 194
tasmān matim imāṃ vatsa kuru sarvajñatāptaye // 195
dadyāt sarvakṛtā japtaṃ śiṣyebhyo yatir ādarāt // 199

prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthais taiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet /  gocarmamātrabhūlipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet // 201  ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca /  kuśān śayyopadhānāya bāhusūtraiḥ surakṣayet // 202
oṃ hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpān apanaya hūm //
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā /
